Name: Hammer
Script: On Execute: /*excluded from randomlists so that only dummy's 'Item Idea' (which is almost identical) will show up. Joke.*/ attack(d[;] SHOCK); if(d == 6) inflict(SHOCK); if(d < 6) { sfxdamage(target[;]d); } else { sfxdamage(target[;]d); sfx(~_shock~[;]~~[;]0.2); }

Name: Spatulasword
Description: Do [sword]<d6> damage[;] then|flip the dice upside down

Name: Spatulasword_upgraded
Description: Flip the dice upside down[;]|then do [sword]<flipd6> damage

Name: Fixed Payout_upgraded
Script: On Execute: /*robot's episode needs different wording for fixed payout+*/ if(!simulation) { if(self.usecpuinsteadofdice) { self.roll_jackpotbonus += 2; } } bonus(-10000);
